name: InnoGage
overview:
InnoGage is a Social Media Technology and Strategic Consulting Company and the creator of InnoBlogs, Business Class Blogging.

InnoBlogs is the ultimate Search Engine Optimization and Conversion tool. Harness the power of social media through InnoBlogs rich content system which optimizes each blog post for relevancy and Search. Our workflow does your heavy lifting, reminding bloggers when it’s time to post and our reporting gives you information on your strategic content goals. InnoBlogs is truly the Business Class Bloggingâ„¢ solution.

InnoCMS is our easy-to-use Content Management System. Whether you’re a small business who wants to take control of your website or a company that wants to build a “knowledge center” within your current website, InnoCMS is your answer! InnoCMS allows non-technical users to update web content at anytime, optimized for Search. Because the world doesn’t stand still â€” and neither should your content.

InnoComm is our internal communications portal. Does your company have people in many locations? Do you feel like people are trapped in communication silos? InnoComm opens up communication between people regardless of geography. Improved flow of data means increased efficiencies, a more engaged workforce and increased profits.
